title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 449.8 - Discontinuance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 449.8 - Discontinuance

State Regulations

An authorized agency may not discontinue the operation of
a supervised setting program except upon service of written notice to OCFS at
least 90 days in advance of the proposed discontinuance. Such notice must
comply with the requirements of section
476.2
(d) of this

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
